attributes.action: Bring back full packs of 20 cigarettes for the same price they used to be
attributes.additional_details: Fed up of going to a shop asking for 20  when there's not even 20 in the pack
attributes.background: Couple years ago all cigarette were full packs of 20 now only the expensive brands such as benson and hedges and Marlboro are full 20 packs

rejection.details:
The price of cigarettes is the responsibility of retailers, not the Government or Parliament. Companies which make cigarettes decide how many cigarettes to put in a pack.

If you would like the amount of tax on cigarettes to be lowered, you could start a new petition asking for that.
